description.message: Watch videos while you browse the internet. Works with: YouTube, Netflix, Twitch.tv, Vimeo, Dailymotion, Instagram, TED.

color.message: Color in the YouTube player's video progress bar

chat.message: Show chat for YouTube and Twitch live streams

force_fullscreen.message: Force full screen (press F11 to exit)

close_tab.message: Close current tab when creating a new popup

controls.message: Show player controls on YouTube videos

fullscreen_button.message: Show full screen button on YouTube videos

yt_logo.message: Show YouTube logo that lets you open the video in a new tab

keyboard.message: Allow control of the YouTube player by keyboard

noclick.message: Block mouse events on YouTube videos*

proportion.message: Open YouTube video with the correct aspect ratio

youtube_api.message: Use YouTube API to fix playlist title and figure out when video cannot be embedded

animate_title.message: Animate popup title for YouTube videos*

pause.message: Pause video and continue where you left off

spoof_referrer.message: Spoof Referrer header to be able to embed certain videos

youtube_tv_on_error.message: Play video on YouTube TV if it cannot be embedded*

force_youtube_tv.message: Use YouTube TV for all YouTube videos (not recommended)

fix_popup.message: Fix popup width and height bug on some systems

app.message: Open popup using addon on Chrome OS

borderless.message: Remove borders and title bar on Chrome OS (with addon)

helium.message: Open video with Helium on macOS

helium_pin_tab.message: Pin temporary tab before opening Helium

keep_popup.message: Keep current popup instead of opening a new one

keep_dimensions.message: Keep position and current dimensions of popup when changing video

cannot_play.message: Cannot embed video. Play it on YouTube?
